name: BindingSelectionChangedEventArgs
description: Provides information about the binding that raised the SelectionChanged event.

properties.name: binding
properties.description: Gets the Binding object that represents the binding that raised the SelectionChanged event.

properties.name: startRow
properties.description: Gets the index of the first row of the selection (zero-based).

properties.name: startColumn
properties.description: Gets the index of the first column of the selection (zero-based).

properties.name: rowCount
properties.description: Gets the number of rows selected.

properties.name: columnCount
properties.description: Gets the number of columns selected.
